entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement pinning for container images consumed in dotnet/runtime #113455
  • MetadataUpdateHandler not working in custom host #113452
  • Process.Start with RedirectStandardOutput fails with System.PlatformNotSupportedException in .NET 9 #113450
  • Change build pipeline to use Azure Linux VM #113439
  • BufferedStream LOH allocations #113438
  • System.IO.Ports SerialPort.Open somehow entering into WmMouseUp events #113433
  • plan app build infrastructure #113431
  • pin.exe does not work with latest windows update #113430
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeFixes unable to load the requested types #113428
  • Office COM addin targeting .NET 10 Preview 1 cannot be registered 0x80008096 #113427
  • [NativeAOT][iOS] App Hangs/Freezes with Static Virtual Properties in Interfaces on .NET 9 #113423
  • OOM in Dns query can crash #113419
    10.0.0
  • Windows Shutdown ETW Recording for JITed stacks is not working. #113412
  • Semaphore performance issue #113411
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ApplicationVersion to IHostEnvironment #113410

Closed

  • PublicKey.ExportSubjectPublicKeyInfo() fails when parameters are absent #110715
    10.0.0
  • ARM32 SIMD / NEON instruction set support #113317
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/leave/catch2_r/catch2_r.dll under jitstress 2 #113417
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] [.NET Framework 4.8] [x86] System.Diagnostics HttpHandler test failure: Remote process failed with an unhandled exception #112426
    10.0.0
  • Feature Request: Bind Type Discriminator to Property in System.Text.Json Polymorphic Deserialization #113421
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Sync.HandleCollectionsAsync #70644
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.SerializationWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripIndexViewModel #67830
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #64888
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\AssemblyDependencyResolver\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests.cmd #63143
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow me to bring my own HttpClient implementations #113395
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.UnityDependencyInjectionSpecificationTests.FactoryServicesAreCreatedAsPartOfCreatingObjectGraph #51832
    Future
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.TokenExpirationTests.PostEvictionCallbacksGetInvokedWhenMemoryCacheEntriesExpireWithAnActiveChangeToken #49633
    Future
  • [x86][Windows][JitStress2] eventsourcetrace: Unhandled Exception: System.Exception: Read past end of stream. #12642
    Future
  • JIT: pgostress hitting assert in vector division #113393
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.AddRange(Span<T>) and List<T>.AddRange(ReadOnlySpan<T>) #113415
  • [API Proposal]: Predefined `InlineArrayX<T>` types up to some X #111973
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] Self-signed certificates flood Windows Security event log #108966
    8.0.x
  • Proposal: Include Actual Error Message in Exception Thrown by EnsureSuccessStatusCode() #113408
  • JIT: Bad result with modulo on linux-arm64 #113320
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][interp] Add SN Vector intrinsics #113456
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove FileExtensionSignInfos for .deb, .rpm, & .pkg #113451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113449
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Propagate exceptions in `GetAddressInfoExCallback` #113444
    area-System.Net
  • Host: fix Cancellation not aborting Start in some cases #113442
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Update Ubuntu pipelines from 18.04 to 22.04 #113441
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor assertprop a bit #113440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink : Fix instantiation tracking issue with icall/pinvoke parameters #113437
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SafeFileHandle.ThreadPoolValueTaskSource made ligher by one field #113435
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Fix instantiation tracking bug with `[Intrinsic]` methods. #113434
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Run stress tests nightly against staging branches #113432
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] initial build of coreclr.runtime #113429
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add trim-safe ValidationContext constructor #113426
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch to AwesomeAssertions #113425
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113418
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Initial CoreClr Android logcat log integration. #113416
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow NTLM tests on newer Linux distributions #113414
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Hang on when GetRequestStreamAsync #113409
    area-System.Net
  • Fixing stack overflow in System.Private.CoreLib (issue #113189) #113407
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Update to Ubuntu 25.04 #113405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT] Stub Precode variant for DynamicHelpers #113402
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Allow null key parameters for public keys and certificates. #113420
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't skip non-funclet try regions with handlers in `fgFindTryRegionEnds` #113424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113328
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113333
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Small TP improvement in assertprop #113360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to Azure Linux queues #112024
    area-Infrastructure
  • Don't set PreserveRepoOrigin #113422
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • [browser] profiler setup and env variables #113339
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add the `CurrentUserOnly` and `CurrentSessionOnly` options for named `Mutex`, `Semaphore`, and `EventWaitHandle` #112213
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #113388
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #113389
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OperExceptions for SIMD Divide #113394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable `UseSizeOptimizedLinq` by default on native AOT #113214
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add InlineArrayX types #113403
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Fix blob and symbol package publishing #113377
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: fix arm64 issue around flags and neg with contained operand #113391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused legacy hosting flags #112975
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Include xmmintrin.h early on x86 as well #113279
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Testing] Disable spin waiting when cpu quota limit is enabled #113184
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ISimdVector vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing #113356
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HttpStress] Another attempt on unobserved exceptions #111126
    area-System.Net
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fix SBOM issues for runtime #113400
    area-Meta
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Added in non-generic interfaces for Tensors #113401
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Tensor.Slice No Longer Copies #113166
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix missing ServiceCallSite.Key causing an unkeyed cache entry to be overwritten by a keyed instance #113343
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Modernize `CookieContainer` domain-matching #112604
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Reduce size of x86 intrinsic jump table fallbacks #112556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Mac versions in helix queues #113399
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clear diagnostic headers on request reuse #113342
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Optimize Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #111050
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Pin SHAs for container images" #113248
    needs-area-label
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Allow limited recursive inlining #112318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `fgReorderBlocks` #113335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issues in GetKeyedService() and GetKeyedServices() with AnyKey #113137
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Simplify conditional operator #112074
    area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113384
    needs-area-label
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back CLRTestTargetUnsupported to mcc build projects #112399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Change default boot config to dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix assertions related to combining `cmn (extended-register)` (#113337) #113376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
